DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate safety efficacy extrafascial hysterectomy compare modified radical hysterectomy , plus level 1 pelvic lymph-node dissection , patient early stage IA2-IB1 cervical cancer ≤ 2cm . The experimental procedure consider promising treatment stage IA2-IB1 cervical cancer ≤ 2cm Bayesian posterior probability `` difference 3-y DFS rate less non-inferiority margin 5 % '' least 50 % . Thus , use proof concept design , plan sample size 40 , 20 case per arm , provide 72 % chance satisfy criterion , hypothesis low 3-y DFS rate arm 90 % . As require , adjuvant therapy include cisplatin-based chemo-radiation pelvic radiation alone ( EBRT +/- intracavitary brachytherapy ) indicate accord # GOG92 # GOG109 criterion .
